parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description:
The accelerated domain name. You can specify a maximum of 500 domain names in a request. Separate multiple domain names with commas (,).

By default, this operation queries the QPS of all accelerated domain names that belong to your Alibaba Cloud account.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format in the ISO 8601 standard. The time is displayed in UTC.

> The end time must be later than the start time.

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description:
The time interval between the data entries to return. Unit: seconds.

The time granularity varies with the maximum time range per query. Valid values: 300 (5 minutes), 3600 (1 hour), and 86400 (1 day). For more information, see **Description**.

parameters.name: IspNameEn
parameters.description: The name of the Internet service provider (ISP) for your Alibaba Cloud CDN service. You can call the [DescribeCdnRegionAndIsp](~~91077~~) operation to query ISPs. If you do not set this parameter, all ISPs are queried.

parameters.name: Layer
parameters.description:
The layers at which you want to query the number of queries per second. Valid values:

*   **Network layer**: **IPv4**and **IPv6**.
*   **Application layer**: **http**, **https**, and **quic**.
*   **all**: The default value. Both the network and application layers are included.

parameters.name: LocationNameEn
parameters.description: The name of the region. You can call the [DescribeCdnRegionAndIsp](~~91077~~) operation to query the most recent region list. If you do not set this parameter, all regions are queried.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format in the ISO 8601 standard. The time is displayed in UTC.
